epic_description: Implement secure login, signup, and password reset. Includes email verification and two-factor authentication for account security.

user_stories.title: User Registration
user_stories.description: As a new user, I want to be able to create an account with a valid email address and password so that I can access the application.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am on the registration page, When I enter a valid email address, a strong password, and confirm the password, and click 'Register', Then I should receive a confirmation email.
Given I am on the registration page, When I enter an invalid email address, a weak password, or mismatched passwords, and click 'Register', Then I should see appropriate error messages.
Given I have successfully registered, When I try to register again with the same email address, Then I should see an error message indicating that the email address is already in use.

user_stories.title: User Login
user_stories.description: As a registered user, I want to be able to log in to the application using my email address and password so that I can access my account.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am on the login page, When I enter my registered email address and password, and click 'Login', Then I should be redirected to my account dashboard.
Given I am on the login page, When I enter an incorrect email address or password, and click 'Login', Then I should see an error message indicating invalid credentials.
Given I am on the login page, When I enter my email address and password, and click 'Remember Me', Then my login information should be saved for future sessions.

user_stories.title: Password Reset
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to reset my password if I forget it so that I can regain access to my account.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am on the login page, When I click on 'Forgot Password', and enter my registered email address, and click 'Submit', Then I should receive an email with a password reset link.

Given I click on the password reset link in the email, When I enter a new password and confirm it, and click 'Reset Password', Then my password should be updated, and I should be redirected to the login page.
Given I request multiple password reset emails, When I attempt to use an old reset link, Then the link should be invalid, and I should be prompted to request a new one.

user_stories.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to enable two-factor authentication on my account so that I can add an extra layer of security.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am logged in to my account, When I navigate to the security settings and enable 2FA, Then I should be prompted to scan a QR code or enter a setup key into an authenticator app.
Given I have 2FA enabled, When I log in, Then I should be prompted to enter a verification code from my authenticator app.
Given I have 2FA enabled, When I enter an incorrect verification code, Then I should see an error message and be prompted to try again.
